reviews.review:
This movie is a perfect combination of action, drama and comedy in the MU. It brings the Earth's mighty heroes to an unseen threat that could easily put all them down.
Also Stan lee's Cameo is the best.

predictable dialogue, mediocre storyline, unnecessarily long, and could have waited for the rental. it took so long to get to the end I didn't care what happened to any of the characters. I'm giving points for the special effects.

I had no idea how the writers and director would be able to handle such a huge cast of characters. Everybody but Ant Man is in this epic. So what did they do?  They added four more MCU characters NOT in the credits. And did it masterfully. Until last night Black Panther was my favorite MCU movie Now it's Infinity War.  I have never seen a movie this epic executed with such precision. The decision to make Thor comic relief is brilliant.  Thanos is not only three dimensional, he (sorry humans) makes sense. Not even going to bother talking about the action. Let's get into all the twists. Holy Moses. I didn't see any of them coming. Some were in casting (Hi Peter Dinklege) to plot (see for yourself).  The film also managers to tie in nearly every previous MCU movie, making all 19 movies one big long 40 moviie. My prediction: it'll make it's money back.
A very good movie all the way up to the very cheap ending.....that ruined it.    To be continued doesnt play well in American Cinema.
Possibly the best Marvel movie ever
99.94 out of a 100 is my rating of the Avengers Infinity War. It was pretty AMAZING!

The best Marvel Movie ever made and easily one of the greatest superhero movies of all time. Hats off to the Russo Brothers for delivering an absolute epic in every sense of the word.
Seeing the Avengers team up with the Guardians of the Galaxy was an absolute dream come true. And Josh Brolin as Thanos is one of the best villains in a comic book movie in a long time.
The Infinity War is another feather in Russo Brothers cap after The Winter Soldier and Civil War. It also has something that even the Hardcore Marvel comic book fans will appreciate.
